sentences.en: Cogsworth: Well, Lumiere, old friend. Shall we let bygones be bygones?
sentences.cn: 考克斯维斯: 啊, 吕米埃, 老朋友. 是不是真的往事一去不返了?

sentences.en: INSIDER TRICK: Levin brushed Chanel Lift Lumiere foundation in Beige over Aniston's moisturized skin.
sentences.cn: 内幕把戏: 安吉拉用米色的香奈儿粉底(用于安妮斯顿的皮肤).

sentences.en: Lumiere : En garde, you overgrown pocket watch!
sentences.cn: 吕米埃: 准备好了, 你这只笨重的怀表!

sentences.en: Lumiere: Did you see that? It's a girl!
sentences.cn: 吕米埃: 你看见了 吗 ?是个女孩子哎!
吕米埃: 这真是奇迹!

sentences.en: Lumiere: Of course. I told you she would break the spell.
sentences.cn: 吕米埃: 当然. 我跟你说过她会破除这个魔咒的.
吕米埃: 跟她说点什么.
卢米亚: 就是今晚了.

sentences.en: The earliest demonstration of a celluloid cinematograph film was given at Paris Auguste and Louis Lumiere.
sentences.cn: 奥古斯特和路易斯·吕米埃在巴黎演示最早的电影片.

sentences.en: Well , Lumiere, old friend . Shall we let bygones be bygones?
sentences.cn: 卢米亚好兄弟,过去的事真是一场 恶梦.

trans.tran_cn: 电影时光（专辑名称）；卢米埃（男子名）
